thread.title: Hot singer actress Suchithra alleges Dhanush team attacked her - Tamil Movie News
thread.title_full: Hot singer actress Suchithra alleges Dhanush team attacked her - Tamil Movie News

title: Hot singer actress Suchithra alleges Dhanush team attacked her - Tamil Movie News
text: Breaking! Dhanush's Hollywood debut back on track - Full details Singer-Actress Suchithra Karthick Kumar has caused huge concern amongst her well wishers as she has been posting highly disturbing statements regarding Dhanush. It is made to look like as though she and the 'VIP2' hero were in some kind of altercation where she was attacked by his staff or friends. When we tried to get in touch with Suchi, our call wasn't answered and all our efforts to try and meet her were in vain. Hope everything is fine with the talented personality and she clarifies about what is going on. There are also confusion whether Suchi's account has been hacked and some miscreant is playing the fool by unnecessarily pulling up the celebrity names. This is Suchi, I'm back. Im safe and I'm ready to tell everyone what a lousy game #Dhanush played. no imagination. Paavum. #Simbu you're it
